titles.title: Boating and Aviation Operation Safety Act of 1994
Boating and Aviation Operation Safety Act of 1995
Boating and Aviation Operation Safety Act of 1996
To amend title 11 of the United States Code to make nondischargeable a debt for death or injury caused by the debtor's operation of watercraft or aircraft while intoxicated.

bill.summary: 6/4/1996--Passed House amended. Boating and Aviation Operation Safety Act of 1996 - Amends Federal bankruptcy law to make nondischargeable in bankruptcy a debt for death or personal injury caused by the debtor's operation of a watercraft or aircraft while intoxicated from alcohol, a drug, or other substance.
